original: intros a nZa eqApT1 Q p q HpQ Hcp r s Hcr Heqp Heqq. apply Rstar_0. assert (Ha : eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)). - rewrite Heqp, Heqq. reflexivity. apply reduce_mults with (cs:=cs) in Ha. apply reduce_inv with (cs:=cs) in Ha. apply reduce_eqp_com with (cs:=cs) in H. apply Rstar_0. apply H.
